attributes.action: Allow Ukrainian citizens with family in the UK to enter the UK without a visa.
attributes.background: Currently Ukrainian citizens need a visa for any type of entry to the UK. UK embassies are now closed in Kiev which means Ukrainian people who have relatives living in the UK cannot be reunited with their loved ones. Remove visa requirements so that families can be reunited and safe.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Allow Ukrainians with family in the UK to enter the UK without a visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609397
